title: Vinegar: A potential source of healthy and functional food with special reference to sugarcane vinegar - Frontiers
summary: This article studies the production process of sugarcane vinegar. The research and development of vinegar is also discussed. The introduction covers the history and current status of vinegar, as well as its identification, screening, and sensory quality development. A conclusion and future directions for vinegar research are provided.
likely_naics_codes: ['311225: Sugarcane Mills', '311999: Other Food Manufacturing', '111998: All Other Miscellaneous Crop Farming', '311919: Other Sugar and Confectionery Product Manufacturing']
greenwashing: The article does not mention the performance or benefits of the product or process, so it is not possible to determine if this is an example of greenwashing.
